verbs.description: slow - cooker faux prime rib roast [ARG1: this] [V: is] [ARG2: my first original recipe inspired by a great holiday dinner with friends] i wanted to see if i could do something similar with a less expensive cut of meat the faux prime rib roast can also be baked in a covered dutch oven at 350 ° for about 1 - 1 2 hours or until 165 ° the beef is also delicious served with regular or horseradish mashed potatoes —kimberly kuhlman bryan texas cook
